Name: Contractor Selection Committee, ICCIS
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York in relation to including the names of contractor selection committee members in the Integrated Comprehensive Contract Information System.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

	Section one.  Subparagraph (7) of paragraph a of section 6-116.2 of the administrative code of  the city of New York is hereby amended, subparagraph (9) of such paragraph is hereby re-numbered as subparagraph (8) and amended, and a new subparagraph (9) is added, to read as follows:
	(7)	the date of any public hearing held with respect to the contract and the date and agenda number of action taken with respect to a concession or franchise by the franchise and concession review committee; [and 
	(9)]	(8)	the contract budget category to which the contract is assigned, where applicable[,]; and
	(9)	the names of selection committee members.
	ï¿½2.	This local law shall take effect immediately, but shall apply only to contracts awarded after its effective date.
